name: Key Master
description:
Key Master is the first triple AAA indie game(prototype) made by a team of one guy with vast experience on doing his first indie game, or not.

You play as a spooky skeleton and your main objective is to defeat waves after waves of heroes that try to kil... er... take the life out of your skeleton in order to drop the mighty golden skull key to open the chest in the middle of the room.

Controls:

  • Directional Arrows - Move your character and attack adjacent enemies
  • Space and Z - Defend against enemy attacks
  • X - Consume the bodies of your enemies to replenish your lost bones
  • Enter - Pause the game
